attributes.action: Keep the University Campus in Stafford Open
attributes.additional_details:
The management at Staffordshire University is seeking to close its Stafford Campus without proper consultation with its stakeholders and without seeking opinions of the general body of students who study at that campus.

The closure of Stafford Campus will have a crippling effect on the local economy, with many businesses depending on the University. The town of Stafford and the students who study there support Stafford campus and want it to stay.
